findings.title: Incorrect TOR_V2_AUTH_COOKIE_REGEX regular expression when validating config
findings.description: The TOR_V2_AUTH_COOKIE_REGEX regular expression has an "A-z" character range specified in its character set, which overlaps with the "a-z" range and includes characters outside of the Tor v2 auth cookie format.

findings.title: TarFile.extractall Usage
findings.description: Possible path traversal through tarfile.open($PATH).extractall() if the source tar is controlled by an attacker.

findings.title: Hardening of SecureDrop applications
findings.description: The SecureDrop programs do not use all of the Linux isolation or sandboxing possibilities like namespaces, control groups, seccomp profiles or the NoNewPrivs flag, which may enable an attacker to exploit the SecureDrop system due to increased attack surface.
